mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.*from (select notice_no, member_tbl.member_no, member_nickname, notice_title, notice_content, to_char(notice_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_date from notice_tbl join member_tbl on member_tbl.member_no = notice_tbl.member_no order by notice_no desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
